resources.string: This small app is a demo of open source ebook conversion libraries, mainly for the benefit of other developers. Find the source code and open source licenses at github.com/gregko/EbookConverter. The app may be also useful to end users, providing ebook conversions from MOBI/PCR/AZW and FB2 formats to EPUB.
Press the folder button below to select MOBI/PRC/AZW/AZW3 or FB2 ebook file to covert to EPUB format.
Cannot create/rename/delete anything here, no write permission.
Selected folder does not have write permission.
This app needs to read and write storage in order to open local files for reading and allow you to save conversion results. Please allow access to external storage.
Sorry, this app cannot work without access to external storage. Please grant Storage access permission through System Settings - Apps, or uninstall this app.
